cab.content: TELEGRAM from the Governor General of Canada to the -Secretary of State for the Colonies.Dated March 6th. (Received Colonial Office 11 p.nu 6th March 1920)March 6th,, Your telegram 22nd January and my telegram 6th February League of Nations owing to difficulty of discussing matter by telegraphic correspondence it has been decided to. send an official of Department of External Affairs to London to confer with you on the spot. Accordingly Mr.L.C.Christie legal adviser to Department is sailing March .6th'from New York on s.s.Carmania it is hoped that you will put him in touch with appropriate authorities so that he may report back to Ottawa as soon as possible.DEVONSHIRE. -
